text: Ate jisa dina alaha unham sari'am nu ikatha karega, he jinam de jhudo! Tusim manukham vicom bahuta lai la'e. Ate manukham vicom unham de sathi kahinage ki he sade palanahara! Asim ika duje nu varati'a ate asim pahuca ga'e apane usa va'ade te jihara tu sade la'i niyata kita si. Alaha akhega, ki huna tuhada tikana aga hai. Tusim sada hi isa aga vica rahoge, para je alaha cahe. Besaka alaha tuhada raba, bibekasila ate gi'ana vala hai
